tasks.label: Wait: Docker Desktop install status
args: Start-Sleep -Seconds 8; "---"; Get-Command docker -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Source -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; docker --version

tasks.label: Check: Docker Path + Desktop
args: $paths=@("C:\\Program Files\\Docker\\Docker\\resources\\bin","C:\\Program Files\\Docker\\Docker"); $paths | ForEach-Object { if (Test-Path $_) { "FOUND: $_" } }; Get-Command "C:\\Program Files\\Docker\\Docker\\Docker Desktop.exe" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Source -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-Command docker -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Source -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; where.exe docker 2>$null

tasks.label: Check: Docker Files Exist
args: Test-Path "C:\\Program Files\\Docker\\Docker"; Get-ChildItem "C:\\Program Files\\Docker\\Docker" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 30 | Format-Table Name

tasks.label: Check: Docker EXE Path
args: $p1 = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles 'Docker\Docker\resources\bin\docker.exe'; $p2 = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles 'Docker\Docker\docker.exe'; Write-Host "p1=$p1"; Write-Host "p2=$p2"; Write-Host "exists1=$(Test-Path $p1)"; Write-Host "exists2=$(Test-Path $p2)"; if (Test-Path $p1) { & $p1 --version }; if (Test-Path $p1) { & $p1 compose version }

tasks.label: Start Docker Desktop + Wait
args: $desktop = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles 'Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; $docker = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles 'Docker\Docker\resources\bin\docker.exe'; if (Test-Path $desktop) { Start-Process $desktop }; $deadline = (Get-Date).AddMinutes(3); while ((Get-Date) -lt $deadline) { try { & $docker version | Out-String | Write-Host; Write-Host 'Docker is ready'; exit 0 } catch { Start-Sleep -Seconds 5; Write-Host 'Waiting for Docker engine...' } }; Write-Host 'Docker did not become ready in time'; exit 1

tasks.label: Check: Docker Info ExitCode
args: $docker="$env:ProgramFiles\Docker\Docker\resources\bin\docker.exe"; & $docker info; Write-Host exit=$LASTEXITCODE; & $docker version; Write-Host exit=$LASTEXITCODE

tasks.label: Check: Docker Engine Connectivity
args: $docker=$env:ProgramFiles + '\Docker\Docker\resources\bin\docker.exe'; & $docker info; Write-Host exit=$LASTEXITCODE; & $docker version; Write-Host exit=$LASTEXITCODE

tasks.label: Check: Docker Engine Connectivity 2
args: $docker=$env:ProgramFiles + "\\Docker\\Docker\\resources\\bin\\docker.exe"; & $docker info; Write-Host exit=$LASTEXITCODE; & $docker version; Write-Host exit=$LASTEXITCODE

tasks.label: Wait: Docker Server Ready
args: $desktop = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles 'Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; $docker = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles 'Docker\Docker\resources\bin\docker.exe'; if (Test-Path $desktop) { Start-Process $desktop }; $deadline = (Get-Date).AddMinutes(5); while ((Get-Date) -lt $deadline) { & $docker info; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host 'READY'; exit 0 } else { Write-Host 'Waiting for Docker server...'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 5 } }; Write-Host 'TIMEOUT'; exit 1

tasks.label: Wait: Docker Server Ready (poll)
args: $docker = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles 'Docker\Docker\resources\bin\docker.exe'; $deadline = (Get-Date).AddMinutes(5); while ((Get-Date) -lt $deadline) { & $docker info | Out-String | Select-Object -First 1 | Write-Host; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host 'READY'; exit 0 } else { Write-Host 'not-ready'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 5 } }; exit 1

tasks.label: Wait: Docker Engine Ready (10m)
args: $desktop = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles 'Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; $docker = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles 'Docker\Docker\resources\bin\docker.exe'; if (Test-Path $desktop) { Start-Process $desktop | Out-Null }; $deadline = (Get-Date).AddMinutes(10); while ((Get-Date) -lt $deadline) { $ts=(Get-Date).ToString('HH:mm:ss'); & $docker info > $null 2>&1; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host "$ts READY"; exit 0 } else { Write-Host "$ts waiting..."; Start-Sleep -Seconds 5 } }; Write-Host 'TIMEOUT'; exit 1

tasks.label: Wait: Docker Engine Ready (10m) v2
args: $desktop = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles "Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe"; $docker = Join-Path $env:ProgramFiles "Docker\Docker\resources\bin\docker.exe"; if (Test-Path $desktop) { Start-Process $desktop | Out-Null }; $deadline = (Get-Date).AddMinutes(10); while ((Get-Date) -lt $deadline) { $ts=(Get-Date).ToString('HH:mm:ss'); & $docker info *> $null; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host ($ts + ' READY'); exit 0 } else { Write-Host ($ts + ' waiting...'); Start-Sleep -Seconds 5 } }; Write-Host 'TIMEOUT'; exit 1

tasks.label: E2E: Tenant AI config smoke
args: $ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; $api='http://localhost:4000'; $health=Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "$api/health"; Write-Host "health ok=$($health.ok)"; $bootBody=@{ tenantName='AI Smoke Tenant'; email=('manager+'+[Guid]::NewGuid().ToString('N').Substring(0,6)+'@demo.local'); password='password123'; displayName='Manager AI' } | ConvertTo-Json; $boot=Invoke-RestMethod -Method Post -Uri "$api/dev/bootstrap" -ContentType application/json -Body $bootBody; $tenantId=$boot.tenant.id; $userId=$boot.user.id; $role=$boot.user.role; Write-Host "tenantId=$tenantId userId=$userId role=$role"; $headers=@{ 'x-tenant-id'=$tenantId; 'x-user-id'=$userId; 'x-role'=$role }; $seedBody=@{ tenantId=$tenantId; salesmanCount=5 } | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Method Post -Uri "$api/dev/seed" -ContentType application/json -Body $seedBody | Out-Null; $cfg1=Invoke-RestMethod -Method Get -Uri "$api/ai/config" -Headers $headers; Write-Host ("cfg provider="+$cfg1.config.provider+" model="+$cfg1.config.openaiModel+" hasKey="+$cfg1.config.hasOpenaiApiKey); $patchBody=@{ provider='OPENAI'; openaiModel='gpt-4o-mini' } | ConvertTo-Json; $cfg2=Invoke-RestMethod -Method Patch -Uri "$api/ai/config" -Headers $headers -ContentType application/json -Body $patchBody; if ($cfg2.warning) { Write-Host ("patch warning="+$cfg2.warning) }; $cfg3=Invoke-RestMethod -Method Get -Uri "$api/ai/config" -Headers $headers; Write-Host ("cfg after provider="+$cfg3.config.provider+" model="+$cfg3.config.openaiModel+" hasKey="+$cfg3.config.hasOpenaiApiKey); $ingestBody=@{ channel='WHATSAPP'; fullName='Test Customer'; phone='+971500000999'; customerMessage='Hi, need price and delivery ASAP' } | ConvertTo-Json; $ing=Invoke-RestMethod -Method Post -Uri "$api/ingest/message" -Headers @{ 'x-tenant-id'=$tenantId } -ContentType application/json -Body $ingestBody; Write-Host ("ingest ok leadId="+$ing.leadId+" triageReason="+$ing.triage.reason+" escal="+$ing.draft.shouldEscalate); $lead=Invoke-RestMethod -Method Get -Uri ("$api/leads/"+$ing.leadId) -Headers $headers; Write-Host ("lead heat="+$lead.lead.heat+" lang="+$lead.lead.language+" messages="+($lead.lead.messages.Count));

args: $ip='13.201.185.222'; Write-Host ('IP='+$ip); Write-Host '--- PORTS'; Test-NetConnection $ip -Port 22 | Select-Object -ExpandProperty TcpTestSucceeded; Test-NetConnection $ip -Port 80 | Select-Object -ExpandProperty TcpTestSucceeded; Write-Host '--- HTTP /'; try { $r=Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ("http://$ip/") -TimeoutSec 8; Write-Host ('status='+$r.StatusCode); } catch { Write-Host ('FAILED '+$_.Exception.Message) }; Write-Host '--- HTTP /api/health'; try { $r2=Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ("http://$ip/api/health") -TimeoutSec 8; Write-Host ('status='+$r2.StatusCode); Write-Host $r2.Content; } catch { Write-Host ('FAILED '+$_.Exception.Message) }; Write-Host '--- SSH local /api/health'; ssh -i sak-sms-2026.pem -o BatchMode=yes -o ConnectTimeout=10 ubuntu@$ip "curl -sS -m 6 http://127.0.0.1/api/health || true; echo '---'; curl -sS -m 6 http://127.0.0.1:4000/api/health || true"

args: $ip='13.201.185.222'; Write-Host ('IP='+$ip); Write-Host '--- PORTS'; Test-NetConnection $ip -Port 22 | Select-Object -ExpandProperty TcpTestSucceeded; Test-NetConnection $ip -Port 80 | Select-Object -ExpandProperty TcpTestSucceeded; Write-Host '--- HTTP /'; try { $r=Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ("http://$ip/") -TimeoutSec 8; Write-Host ('status='+$r.StatusCode) } catch { Write-Host ('FAILED '+$_.Exception.Message) }; Write-Host '--- HTTP /api/health'; try { $r2=Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ("http://$ip/api/health") -TimeoutSec 8; Write-Host ('status='+$r2.StatusCode); Write-Host $r2.Content } catch { Write-Host ('FAILED '+$_.Exception.Message) }; Write-Host '--- SSH local checks'; $remote='curl -sS -m 6 http://127.0.0.1/api/health; echo ---; curl -sS -m 6 http://127.0.0.1:4000/api/health'; ssh.exe -i sak-sms-2026.pem -o BatchMode=yes -o ConnectTimeout=10 ("ubuntu@"+$ip) $remote

tasks.label: Smoke: SSH echo
args: ssh -i sak-sms-2026.pem -o BatchMode=yes -o ConnectTimeout=8 ubuntu@13.201.185.222 "echo SSH_OK"

tasks.label: Check: EC2 reachable (cmd)
args: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ip='13.201.185.222'; Write-Host ('22='+(Test-NetConnection $ip -Port 22).TcpTestSucceeded); Write-Host ('80='+(Test-NetConnection $ip -Port 80).TcpTestSucceeded); try { $r=Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ('http://'+$ip+'/') -TimeoutSec 6; Write-Host ('http='+$r.StatusCode) } catch { Write-Host 'http=FAIL' }"

tasks.label: Check: EC2 reachable (no quotes)
args: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ip=\"13.201.185.222\"; Write-Host (\"22=\" + (Test-NetConnection $ip -Port 22).TcpTestSucceeded); Write-Host (\"80=\" + (Test-NetConnection $ip -Port 80).TcpTestSucceeded); try { $r=Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri (\"http://\"+$ip+\"/\") -TimeoutSec 6; Write-Host (\"http=\"+$r.StatusCode) } catch { Write-Host \"http=FAIL\" }"
